wikipedia_page.main: Jo Sidhu QC (Punjabi: ਜੋ ਸਿਧੁ) (born in 1966 in Southall, London) is a leading British criminal law barrister.

link_mentions.page: Legal services in the United Kingdom
response: Over the years there have been a number of associations setup to represent the diverse communities that now constitute the legal profession including the Society of Asian Lawyers led by Jo Sidhu, Society of Black Lawyers, the Association of Asian Women Lawyers and others.
* Jo Sidhu QC – criminal law barrister
